aboutPage.title: About Kodera
aboutPage.subtitle: Empowering developers with premium source code and resources
aboutPage.missionP1: At Kodera, our mission is to democratize access to high-quality source code and development resources for developers worldwide. We believe that great code should be accessible, affordable, and inspire innovation.
aboutPage.missionP2: We partner with talented developers and creators to bring the best templates, components, and solutions to our community. Our platform makes it easy for developers to discover, purchase, and implement production-ready code.
aboutPage.valueQualityDesc: We are committed to providing only the highest quality source code and resources. Every product is carefully reviewed and tested.
aboutPage.valueDeveloperDesc: We build our platform with developers in mind. Our goal is to save you time and accelerate your development process.
aboutPage.valueCommunityDesc: We believe in the power of community. Our platform connects creators with developers who appreciate their work.
aboutPage.ctaSubtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Get in touch with our team to learn more about Kodera.

documentationPage.title: Developer Documentation
documentationPage.subtitle: Everything you need to integrate Kodera into your application.

license.title: License Agreement
license.grantText: Kodera grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the purchased source code for your personal or commercial project. This license does not grant you the right to sell, redistribute, or sublicense the source code.

restrictionsList.item1: Resell or redistribute the source code without prior written permission
restrictionsList.item2: Remove copyright or license notices from the source code
restrictionsList.item3: Use the source code to create competing products
restrictionsList.item4: Reverse engineer or decompile the source code
restrictionsList.item5: Transfer the license to another person or entity

license.ownershipText: All intellectual property rights to the source code, including but not limited to copyrights, patents, and trademarks, are retained by the original creator or Kodera. You acknowledge that no title to the intellectual property in the source code is transferred to you.

usageList.item1: Use the source code in your personal projects
usageList.item2: Use the source code in your commercial applications
usageList.item3: Modify the source code for your specific needs

license.prohibitedText: You agree not to engage in any activity that violates this License Agreement or any applicable law or regulation. This includes but is not limited to selling, licensing, or distributing the source code without authorization.
license.terminationText: Kodera reserves the right to terminate this license if you violate any terms of this agreement. Upon termination, you must delete all copies of the source code in your possession.
license.warrantyText: The source code is provided "as-is" without warranty of any kind, express or implied. Kodera does not warrant that the source code will be error-free or that it will function without interruption.
license.liabilityText: In no event shall Kodera be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the source code, even if Kodera has been advised of the possibility of such damages.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionText: Kodera ("we", "our", or "us") operates the Kodera website. This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data.
privacy.dataCollectionIntro: We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you.
privacy.dataUsageIntro: Kodera uses the collected data for various purposes:

dataUsageList.item1: To provide and maintain our Service
dataUsageList.item2: To notify you about changes to our Service
dataUsageList.item4: To monitor and analyze usage patterns
dataUsageList.item5: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues

privacy.dataProtectionText: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, but we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our Service and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.
privacy.thirdPartyText: Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
privacy.userRightsText: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time by logging into your account or contacting us. We will respond to your request within 30 days.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.eligibilityText: At Kodera, we want you to be satisfied with your purchase. If you are not completely satisfied with a product, you may be eligible for a refund within 14 days of your purchase date.
refund.processIntro: To request a refund, please follow these steps:

processList.item2: Include your order number and reason for the refund request
processList.item3: Our team will review your request within 48 hours
processList.item4: If approved, the refund will be processed within 5-7 business days

refund.timeframeText: Refund requests must be submitted within 14 days of the purchase date. Requests received after this period may not be eligible for a refund. We process refunds within 5-7 business days from the approval date.
refund.conditionsIntro: Your refund request may be approved if:

conditionsList.item1: The request is submitted within 14 days of purchase
conditionsList.item2: The source code has not been significantly modified
conditionsList.item3: You provide a valid reason for the refund request
conditionsList.item4: This is your first refund request for this product

refund.nonRefundableIntro: The following items are not eligible for refunds:

nonRefundableList.item1: Digital products that have been downloaded and significantly used
nonRefundableList.item2: Products purchased during special promotions (sale final)
nonRefundableList.item3: Subscription services after the trial period ends

refund.disputesText: If you believe a refund was denied incorrectly, you can appeal the decision by contacting our dispute resolution team. Please provide additional documentation or context regarding your case. We will review your appeal within 10 business days.
refund.contactText: For questions about our refund policy, please contact us at
refund.contactExtra: Our support team is available Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM EST.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.agreementText: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
terms.useLicenseIntro: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on Kodera website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

useLicenseList.item2: Using the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
useLicenseList.item3: Attempting to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on Kodera
useLicenseList.item4: Transferring the materials to another person or "mirroring" the materials on any other server
useLicenseList.item5: Removing any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials

terms.disclaimerText: The materials on Kodera website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Kodera makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
terms.limitationsText: In no event shall Kodera or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Kodera website.
terms.accuracyText: The materials appearing on Kodera website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Kodera does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current. Kodera may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice.
terms.materialsText: The materials on Kodera website are copyrighted. Kodera owns the copyright to all original materials, text, images, graphics, logos, button icons, and software on this website. Unauthorized use of any material is strictly prohibited.
terms.linksText: Kodera has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Kodera of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.
terms.modificationsText: Kodera may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.
terms.governingLawText: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States, and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location.
